module.name: onepassword
module.description: Set up and use 1Password CLI (op). Use when installing the CLI, enabling desktop app integration, signing in (single or multi-account), or reading/injecting/running secrets via op.
module.author: CIRIS Team (converted from Clawdbot)

platform_requirements_rationale: 1Password CLI (op) only available on desktop platforms (macOS, Windows, Linux)
